snippet: Toyota is recalling 198,000 more vehicles because the airbag inflater produced by Takata could rupture.
abstract: Toyota says it is adding 331,000 vehicles to its worldwide recall due to defective airbag inflater made by Takata.
lead_paragraph: Toyota is recalling 198,000 more vehicles because the airbag inflater produced by Takata could rupture.

headline.main: Toyota Adds 331,000 Vehicles to Takata Airbag Recall
headline.print_headline: Toyota Adds 331,000 Vehicles to Takata Airbag Recall
